go_data.justification: Ufd1p is part of the Doa10p complex and the p97-Ufd1-Npl4 complex, which are involved in ERAD pathway and retrotranslocation from the ER to the cytosol.
The p97-Ufd1-Npl4 complex is involved in retrotranslocation from the ER to the cytosol.
Ufd1p is part of the Doa10p complex, which is involved in the ERAD pathway.
